ui-predicate

UIPredicateCoreVue.js

  1. import { PredicateCore } from 'ui-predicate-core';
  2. const { merge } = require('ramda');
  3. import Vue from 'vue';
  5. const defaults = {
  6.   options: {
  7.     /**
  8.      * UIPredicate Vue Adapter own default argument component
  9.      * @param  {Object} columns specified columns
  10.      * @param  {Object} [options=PredicateCore.defaults.options] PredicateCore available options
  11.      * @return {Vue.component}
  12.      * @see core.defaults.getDefaultArgumentComponent
  13.      * @memberof vue.defaults
  14.      */
  15.     getDefaultArgumentComponent(columns, options) {
  16.       return Vue.component('default-argument-component', {
  17.         methods: {
  18.           _onChange({ target: { value: newValue } }) {
  19.             this.$emit('change', newValue);
  20.           },
  21.         },
  22.         props: {
  23.           value: {
  24.             type: null,
  25.             required: true,
  26.           },
  27.         },
  28.         template:
  29.           '<div><input type="text" @change="_onChange" :value="value"></div>',
  30.       });
  31.     },
  32.   },
  33. };
  35. /**
  36.  * UIPredicateCore adapter for VueJS
  37.  * @param       {?dataclasses.CompoundPredicate} [data=PredicateCore.defaults.options.getDefaultData]
  38.  * @param       {Object} [columns=PredicateCore.defaults.columns]
  39.  * @param       {Object} [options=PredicateCore.defaults.options]
  40.  * @return {Promise<core.PredicateCoreAPI>}
  41.  * @memberof core
  42.  */
  43. function UIPredicateCoreVue({ data, columns, options } = {}) {
  44.   const _options = merge(defaults.options, options);
  46.   return PredicateCore({
  47.     data,
  48.     columns,
  49.     options: _options,
  50.   });
  51. }
  53. UIPredicateCoreVue.defaults = defaults;
  55. module.exports = { UIPredicateCoreVue };
